entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent behavior for selecting output formatter based on Accept header with `ReturnHttpNotAcceptable = true` option set #58282
  • AddModelError does not work for expressions that ends with indexer. #58271
  • RedirectHandler doesn't copy content for PATCH requests #58270
  • SignalR JavaScript client sometimes freeze at Connecting or Disconnecting state unexpectedly #58260

Closed

  • blazor.server.js SyntaxError: Unexpected token '{' in Safari Version 16.3. with a Mac Studio using Ventura 13.2 #58212
  • signalr 8 / Angular: The package "url" wasn't found on the file system but is built into node #52082
    8.0.7
  • Bootstrap 5.3.3 upgrade breaks Blazor template styling #58214
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58226
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58261
  • Exception is raised in when setting interactivemode in blazor server authentication type enabled web app project #58222
  • [OutputCaching] `OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices` is always `null` during initialization #55805
    10.0-preview1
  • Using JS Interop in OnInitializedAsync() cannot initially find JS function #29215 #58174

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58280
    area-blazor, tell-mode
  • Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58279
    area-blazor
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58277
    area-blazor, ask-mode
  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing RedirectHandler HasBody doesn't work with PATCH #58269
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-mvc-testing

Merged

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys, update dependencies from Arcade #58278
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.11
  • [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58245
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24506.1 #58263
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58229
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.11

Updated

  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add retry for test Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #58232
